clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Used topically to treat the loss of skin color vitiligo

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Monobenzone is the monobenzyl ether of hydroquinone Monobenzone applied topically to the skin is used as a depigmenting agent inhibitting melanin nbsp produced by polymerization of oxidation products of tyrosine and dihydroxyphenyl compounds Monobenzone works by permanently removing color from normal skin located around skin with vitiligo

incompatibilities.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Agalsidase alfa can be decreased when used in combination with Monobenzone
